Name: GlassBox
About the game: Rotate Your Way Out GlassBox is a puzzle game where you have to get a ball out of a box , you control the box and use the help of gravity to get it out. You can actually choose the ball , but you only control the box . Be Patient, Be Smart, then Be Fast Take your time to understand the logic of a level , it start pretty simple and get more complex quickly, you need to be precise, .Once you think you get it, try finish it fast. Every level has 3 special times to beat: bronze silver and gold. Win then to get a unique reward in coins. Find the Right One Unlock all the balls with coins or find them in levels. Every ball has a different shape, grip, weight and size. Use them at your advantage to achieve every level best score, the right ball for the right level , try to figuring it out!
